products.title: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their oslo blackout black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their oslo blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.title: Genesis Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.description: Give definition to your room design with the bold black finish of this genesis blackout black roller blind. This simple solution for dressing any window will have maximum effect thanks to the striking dark colour and impressive blackout function. The blackout fabric is ideal for blocking out light, keeping in warmth and aiding in easy sleeping.
